results.name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Acworth - Kennesaw Northwest
results.description:
Welcome to the newly renovated Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Acworth, the perfect home away from home. 

Located in the northern Atlanta suburb of Acworth, GA, we are conveniently located at the intersection of Highway 92 and Exit 277 off I-75. Guests enjoy staying in the suburban setting while still having convenient access to Atlanta Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport only 30 miles away. 

The hotel's staff and facilities are perfect for corporate guests. Check your email from anywhere, including the business center, using free Wi-Fi access and wireless internet connections in your room. 

Business travelers love our convenient location near Truegreen, Kennesaw State University, Cartersville Medical Center, Inalfa, Trussway & Northpoint Business Park. Leisure travelers love our hotel's location only minutes away from Lake Allatoona and Lake Acworth.
results.address: 200 Northpoint Way I-75 & Cowan, Acworth, GA 30102

results.name: Lake Allatoona Inn
results.description: Lake Allatoona Inn is located on Lake Allatoona in Cartersville, Georgia. It is a Victorian mansion built in 1892. It has been meticulously restored, maintains its original splendor and is furnished with period antiques. The Inn is located on 16 acres and is across the street from Allatoona Pass Park. It is located on a Civil War battlefield and besides having beautiful rooms boasts a covered riding arena with equine stabling. The Inn also has conference or event facilities. The rooms are beautiful and some of them have jacuzzi tubs. We serve a full cooked breakfast. We are located 1.5 miles off of Interstate 75. Come see us here at the Inn.
results.address: 632 Old Allatoona Rd SE, Cartersville, GA 30121-7608

results.description: Red Roof Inn Atlanta - Kennesaw State University is just minutes away from Cobb County International Airport and Kennesaw State University. Red Roof Inn Atlanta - Kennesaw State University offers you free WiFi, flat screen TVs, coin laundry, dining delivery service, and free truck parking. All rooms feature flat screen TV's with extended cable television. Select rooms offer a microwave & refrigerator, hair dryer, iron & ironing board, work desk, and in-room coffee maker. Complimentary coffeehouse-style coffee & tea are offered in the lobby and one well-behaved family pet per room is welcome.

results.name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott Atlanta Kennesaw
results.description: Southern hospitality is alive and well at the SpringHill Suites Atlanta Kennesaw. Experience the best in service, comfort and amenities with our friendly staff, spacious suites and free high-speed Internet access perfect for business and leisure travelers. Separate living and sleeping areas, combined with features including kitchenettes with mini refrigerators and microwaves, provide a home-like atmosphere. The 24-hour business center is ideal for professionals. Our optimal location between Interstates 75 and 575 gives guests easy access to Marietta and downtown Atlanta, with Barrett Park, Chastain Meadows, West Oaks, the Town Park office communities and growing business destination of northwest Atlanta all nearby. Leisure travelers will appreciate our proximity to East Cobb BB Complex, All Tournament Players Park, Al Bishop Park and Six Flags Whitewater. Kennesaw State University, just two blocks away, hosts many sporting events. Book your stay today, and let us cater to your every need.
